wordquizzle.wqserver

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • wordquizzle.wqserver.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    The Database class implements the server Database as a Singleton

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Database.UserNotFoundException
      Exception thrown when the requested user doesn't exist inside the database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Database getDatabase()
      Return the database singleton
      static com.google.gson.Gson getDBGson()
      Return a GSon object including the custom serializer and deserializers for the User class.
      User getUser(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the user with username name if it exists inside the database.
      boolean hasUser(java.lang.String name)
      Returns true iff the user with username name exists inside the database.
      void updateUser(User user)
      Updates (inserts if it doesn't exist) a user "row" inside the database.

      • getUser

        public User getUser(java.lang.String name)
             throws Database.UserNotFoundException
        Returns the user with username name if it exists inside the database.
        Parameters:
        name - the user's username.
        Returns:
        the relative User object.
        Throws:
        Database.UserNotFoundException - if the user hasn't been found inside the database.

        Returns:
